kind.description: Identifies the API kind for this data

apiVersion.description: Identifies the API group name and version for this data

labels.description:
Labels are the bottle.
The allowable grammar for the keys and values matches kubernetes.
These are bottle wide labels (not to be confused with labels on individual parts).

annotations.description:
Annotations are the bottle.
The allowable grammar for the keys and values matches kubernetes.

description.description: Description is a detailed description of the bottle contents.

name.description: Name is the human understandable name of the source

uri.description:
URI points to the source.
TODO document all the ways we support (the docs are in telemetry/conventions.md right now and need to move over here).

items.description: Source is a definition of a data source used to track data lineage.

sources.description: Sources is the list of sources.

authors.description: Authors is the list of authors.

name.description:
Name is the name for this metric.
Try to be consistent in naming of metrics.

description.description: Description is the detailed description of what this metric represents.

value.description: Value is the floating point value (stored as a string) for this metric.

items.description: Metric is a collection of data about an experiment.

metrics.description: Metrics is the list of metrics.

name.description: Name is the human understandable name of the artifact.

path.description: Path is the path to the file in this bottle (this can drill down into a directory part).

mediaType.description:
MediaType is the an RFC 2045 compliant media type for use in determining how to display this artifact.
For ipynb files use "application/x.jupyter.notebook+json".

items.description: PublicArtifact is a collection of information about files included in the bottle that should be treated specially.

publicArtifacts.description: PublicArtifacts is the list of artifacts.

deprecates.description:
Deprecates is an array of bottle IDs that this bottle deprecates (a.k.a. supersedes).
Deprecated bottles should not be used for new work.
The deprecating bottle often fixes a typo or some other mistake in the deprecated bottle.

name.description:
Name is the path to the part in the bottle.
File parts have no trailing slash.
Directory parts have a trailing slash.

size.description:
Size is the number of bytes in the raw/uncompressed part.
For files this is simply the size of the original file.
For directories this is the size of the archive.

digest.description:
Digest is the content digest.
For files this is the digest of the file.
For directories this is the digest of the archive.

labels.description: Labels to apply to the part (useful for use with part selectors to refer to partial bottles).

items.description: Part represents the layout of individual file records in a bottle metadata json file

parts.description: Parts is a list of parts (the actual data of the bottle is referred to in the parts).

Bottle.description: Bottle represents the overall structure of a data set entry.json or entry.yaml

v1.description: Version v1 of the API v1

apiVersion.description: Identifies the API group name and version for this data

items.description: Source is a definition of a dataset source, containing a name and a url
Maintainer is a collection of information about a maintainer, including name, email, and a URL link
File represents the layout of individual file records in a dataset metadata json file
